subject: World Cup (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: Ukraine is participating in the World Cup for the first time since the breakup of the Soviet Union, which perhaps produced no greater player than Oleg Blokhin, now manager of the Ukraine team.
snippet: Ukraine is participating in the World Cup for the first time since the breakup of the Soviet Union, which perhaps produced no greater player than Oleg Blokhin, now manager of the Ukraine team.
